attributes.additional_details: Pubs are the very institution of British culture and they are vanishing at an alarming rate, it is like written above unless this distruction of Pubs slows down sufficiently then our children may grow up not knowing what it is ordering a pint from the bar freshley pulled. My local The Devonshire is sadly closing down and being turned into private residence for example.
attributes.background: At the rate pubs are being converted into something else our children will grow up not know what it's like to have a pint of beer at a pub, they are closing down at an alarming rate.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
